[vc_row type=”full-width-section” full_height=”yes” columns_placement=”bottom” content_placement=”bottom” parallax=”tt_parallax” parallax_image=”7798″ overlay=”1″ overlay_color=”rgba(10,10,10,0.3)” el_class=”Header”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1603711987376{border-radius: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”FIRE FIGHTING SOLUTIONS” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:58|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:55px” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605015202614{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.01) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1603786216707{margin-bottom: -120px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Fire fighting with fire only gets ashes.
Leave it to us!” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:44|text_align:center|color:%23002949|line_height:1.2″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605059672296{margin-bottom: 5px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”]

[vc_custom_heading text=”Being as established name in the field of fire fighting vehicles and equipment, we are one of the most well-recognized manufacturers, exporters and suppliers of finest quality Fire Fighting Equipment. Our product range includes aerial firefighting apparatus, crash tenders, water tenders, foam tenders, rescue vehicles, and many more.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:16|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605059878597{padding-left: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1603788808831{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-right: 40px !important;margin-left: 10px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #800080 !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”7548″ img_size=”600*375″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” animation=”rda_fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1603798031809{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-right: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;margin-left: -20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”We opt for a customer-oriented and practical working method, meaning that everything leaving our production workshop is unique and is developed and produced in close collaboration with the client in question. In our facility we produce, renovate, service and supply products, such as rapid intervention vehicles, compact water tenders, but also various types of roll-off containers, to fire brigades, first responder organisations, the industry, police and the armed forces, both nationally and abroad.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”AVS has signed a USD 20 Million investment contract with Uttar Pradesh Government of India under Defence Corridor Scheme.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:28|text_align:left|color:%23800080″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”Manufacturing in truck mounted equipment business, our company exports across the globe with its professional personnel and dominance in the African Region – COMESA & ECOWAS.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”Since our establishment of this business division, we have manufactured and fabricated specialised vehicles like fire tenders and aircraft refuellers apart from supplies of all large, medium and small fire-fighting equipment.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”We executed a Project for supplying 104 Fire Tenders under EXIM Line OF Credit for GHANA NATIONAL FIRE SERVICES, making us Asia’s Largest Exporter in the segment.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:28|text_align:left|color:%23800080″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1605015672753{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”7582″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”7559″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”The notable credibility has major clientele in the African Region. Our expertise and excellence in this forte has made us a FIVE TIMES NATIONAL AWARDS WINNING COMPANY.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”We work with high quality raw material, new age tech and give customized and tailormade solutions based on the customer’s requirement. Our product meets international quality standards, and offer user friendly operations, corrosion resistance, optimum tensile strength, durability, renovation and quality assurance through our tailor-made fabrication solutions.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″
